items.title: Commercial Van
items.description: Also known as cargo tires, commercial van tires feature a C at the end of the tire's size and are built with durable, long-lasting materials to help drivers as they haul packages in pickup and delivery applications.

content.body:
### Shop 445/50R22.5 Tire Size 
Super Single (aka Ultra Wide Base) tires are commercial tires that are designed to take the place of dual rear wheels on heavy trucks. Super Singles have the advantage of lower weight and lower rolling resistance without any compromise in load capacity or service life, and the 445/50R22.5 tire size is in the Super Single category. 

Looking for a new set of 445/50R22.5 tires for your commercial truck? Take a look at the Michelin X One Line Energy D, [Continental HTL1](https://simpletire.com/brands/continental-tires/htl1), and Yokohama BluEarth 709L, as all of these Super Single tires offer the kind of traction, performance, long wear, and value you’re looking for in a commercial tire!

Whether you need a commercial or another type of tire, SimpleTire has a set of 445/50R22.5 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
